history.text: Hi!
Have you ever seen this movie?
I found it amusing. The oversaturation of the minions notwithstanding.
Yes. It's been heavily looped on cable, and my dad likes it, so
I have seen it multiple times as well since my kids love it
The rating on these seem off
what do you think?
Rotten Tomatoes is a tough crowd, and even so that's a high score from there.
I agree, that is one of the higher scores I have seen
I think the responses are not that critcal
Kids stuff is rarely put to heavy scrutiny. it's a bonus if it's not boring for adults or insulting pandering to children (Lego movies, I'm looking at you)
To be sure, there was a loooot of merchandising with the minions once this took off, but at least it wasn't a 90 minute commercial. :)
I agree, my kids wanted all the minion toys possible
I cannot see a yellow rounded thing without seeing a minion face anymore. They're cute but my goodness, there are limits.
Can you really say that Gru and Victor have a rivalry in the movie?
I *Just* realized Vector's name is a joke, because vector graphic images can be resized, and he had a shrink ray! Aah!
It was really short lived and I liked it most when gru froze his head
lol...i did not realize that
But nah, I don't see any direct competition really? It was clearly just a device to move the plot
I loved when they want to the amusement park and he blew up the stand...one of the best parts of the movie
also, why not rob a bank to get funding for the project?  They are bad guys
Who doesn't want to blow up a rigged carnival game?
And good point! I wonder if you lose your account at Bank of Evil if you rob another bank... maybe there's an arrangement...
Also, who named these girls?
just don't rob us is the arrangement
Possible..
they were adopted so I can imagine someone wanted them to suffer with those names
weird how the moon blew up in size and at the end was still far away from the earth
I know the hipsters are trying to bring back classic names, but some of them die off for a reason.
i can't recall if they showed the tides going off without the moon but that should've been in there.
i remember the wolf howling and then stopped
and i think he turned back into a man
Ah, yes.
